--- Staff <anna.antenucci@...> wrote:

> 
> Ninja are nothing more than paesant superstition and
> an excuse for
> incompetent bodyguards. There are no ninja, and I
> will hear nothing more on
> the matter.

Staff? Staff of what? I just wish to dispel any
thoughts people may have of you being staff on this
email list. Your declaration that you "will hear
nothing more on the matter" indicates you'll stop
taking emails in case people write about it? 

This isn't necessarily off-topic, though as noted if
people study history then people like Hayes and
Hatsumi are irrelevant at best, kooks at worst. So the
discussion will continue if people wish to continue
it, Ms. Antenucci's opinion notwithstanding. I
recommend you put a block on the word 'ninja' in your
email software--I would, but it would seriously
inhibit my abilities to moderate. 

The asst. management
